block.create_connected.brake.tooltip.sum: A device that produces _immense stress_ when powered, halting the network by _overstressing_ it.
block.create_connected.brass_gearbox.too: A gearbox where the rotation direction of all 4 sides are _independently configurable_.
block.create_connected.centrifugal_clutc: A clutch that is only _coupled_ if the input RPM is _faster_ than a configurable threshold.
block.create_connected.copycat_beam.tool: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative beam.
block.create_connected.copycat_block.too: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative clone.
block.create_connected.copycat_board.too: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative board. Multiple boards can be placed in the same block space.
block.create_connected.copycat_fence.too: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative fence.
block.create_connected.copycat_fence_gat: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a functional fence gate.
block.create_connected.copycat_slab.tool: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative slab. Can be placed _vertically_.
block.create_connected.copycat_stairs.to: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into decorative stairs. Note: buggy connected textures.
block.create_connected.copycat_vertical_: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative vertical step.
block.create_connected.copycat_wall.tool: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative wall.
block.create_connected.fan_blasting_cata: Dedicated _bulk blasting_ device. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
block.create_connected.fan_haunting_cata: Dedicated _bulk haunting_ device. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
block.create_connected.fan_smoking_catal: Dedicated _bulk smoking_ device. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
block.create_connected.fan_splashing_cat: Dedicated _bulk washing_ device. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
A clutch that is only _coupled_ if the input spins in the _correct direction_ as configured.
block.create_connected.overstress_clutch: A clutch that _uncouples_ after a set delay when the network is _overstressed_.
block.create_connected.shear_pin.tooltip: A single-use connector that _breaks_ when the network is _overstressed_.
block.create_connected.six_way_gearbox.t: A gearbox with shafts on _all 6 sides_. Top and bottom spin at _half speed_.
item.create_connected.copycat_box.toolti: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Copycat boards_ pre-assembled into a box for convenient placement.
item.create_connected.copycat_catwalk.to: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Copycat boards_ pre-assembled into a catwalk for convenient placement.
item.create_connected.vertical_brass_gea: A gearbox where the rotation direction of all 4 sides are _independently configurable_.
item.create_connected.vertical_six_way_g: A gearbox with shafts on _all 6 sides_. Top and bottom spin at _half speed_.
